name: Chrisopoeia
description:
Since the dawn of time,  alchemists have tried to permute metals into gold.

This process is referred to as " Chrysopoeia"

The Tabula Smaradigna, highly regarded by Arabic and European alchemists as the origin of their art states:

" That which is above is like to that which is below, and that which is below is like to that which is above."

CONTROLS:

WASD - Movement

Mouse wheel up/down - Select next/previous available material

Left click - Fire Alchemizator (some things cannot be alchemized, sorry) to apply the currently selected material.

Game made in seven days for the 2022 Epic MegaJam with the amazin' help of @paxcu!
